Text:
Hey thanks for the up!  If you have anymore Gene Scott... keep em coming.

I have started sharing the ones I have... as well as re-seeded some of the material in this one.

Thanks Again.

Kings House 7205 here!
I was surprised, and happy, to find this collection on PB! Thanks for posting it. I have a few of Dr. Scott's cassette messages but nothing in this quantity. I have queued all of these up in uTorrent and will seed them as often as I can.

Thanks again for making these available.

The world lost a great man when the Lord took Gene Scott home. As for his wife, I rarely if ever watch her so I have no opinion. If she indeed ordered his material removed from the website and unavailable for purchase then God will deal with her in His own way.
Keep on Faithing!
Thanks so much for making this material available! I had given up ever being able to find any of GENE SCOTT's material on the internet - I've downloaded several torrents and will continue to seed!
Thank You for posting this, i have a few hundred files i converted from the old website, but was missing alot. i'll check to see if i have anything that is not posted here...

We are KH 8095, I used to help answer the phones in Glendale, we have MANY of Dr Scotts teachings on tape, but we do not have very good equipment to turn them from cassette to mp3, I tried! If we sent you copies of the cassettes could you do it? We also want his teachings out there, he was the best teacher we have heard.
Got any of her porn movies?   You did know she did porn, right?

Hey GodmyRock if you are still around you I'd be interested in converting those tapes for you. Contact me via email - ithasn AT gmail DOT com

I am going to be posting some digitized tapes from Gene Scott that I just found. It may take a few day to get them done but they will be up here soon.

Ithasn

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6112538

I have just added another torrent of everything I have.  Please note that i have included everything in this post as well.  Enjoy
